physical_examinations.vital_signs: Aortic annulus: 25 mm, Sinus portion of the ascending aorta: 38 mm, Sinotubular junction: 27 mm, Ascending aorta: 30 mm
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Dilation and elongation of the ascending aorta and arch observed.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive dilation observed in January 2005 with the sinus portion at 44 mm and sinotubular junction at 29 mm.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Progressive dilation of the sinus portion (44 mm) and sinotubular junction (29 mm).
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Further dilation noted in March 2005, increasing the aortic sinus from 44 mm to 48 mm with moderate aortic valve incompetence.
